about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Ahmedabad based Mahip Industries Limited is a company engaged in the manufacturing of packaging materials.

The company's product portfolio includes Stagguard, Box, Corrugated Boxes, Corrugated Boxes with Partition, Corrugated Boxes With Lid, Printed Corrugated Boxes, Customized Corrugated Boxes, Laminated Corrugated Boxes, Bituminized corrugated boxes, Corrugated Cartons/Printed, Corrugated Cartons, Heavy Duty Corrugated Boxes, Multicolor Printed Cartons, Corrugated Sheets, Corrugated Paper Rolls, Auto Slot Boxes & Die Cut Boxes etc.

The company has a facility with an installed capacity of 3500 tons per annum and intends to increase the existing capacity to 8352 tons in near future.

Currently, the company does its business in Gujarat, through its network of dealer/distributor /agents. It also sells directly to the customers. It intends to enter and capture new markets in other states.

It has 50 full-time employees on its payroll.

Competitive Strengths of the Company-

1. Over 2 decades of experience in the industry
2. Varied product portfolio
3. In- House logistic support

faqs.question: What is the Mahip Industries IPO?
faqs.answer:
Mahip Industries IPO is a SME IPO of 5196000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.63 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹32 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on February 26, 2019, and closes on March 1, 2019.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Mahip Industries IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Mahip Industries IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Mahip Industries IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Mahip Industries IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Mahip Industries IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Mahip Industries IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Mahip Industries IPO opens on February 26, 2019 and closes on March 1, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Mahip Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: Mahip Industries IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,28,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Mahip Industries IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Mahip Industries IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
